Title: Increases the fine for operating a motorcycle with a muffler that produces excessive or unusual noise from one hundred dollars to seven hundred dollars
Summary: Increases the fine for operating a motorcycle with a muffler that produces excessive or unusual noise from one hundred dollars to seven hundred dollars.
LawCode: Amd ยง381, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to increasing the fine for operating a motorcycle with a muffler that produces excessive or unusual noise
